entities.name: goblet
entities.description: The goblet is being minutely examined by someone. It's described as a silver goblet with a Black family crest embossed on it.

entities.name: silver
entities.description: The goblet is made of silver, specifically fifteenth-century goblin-wrought silver.

entities.name: black family crest
entities.description: The Black family crest is embossed on the goblet.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: Fred and George bewitched a cauldron of stew to hurtle through the air.

entities.name: stew
entities.description: The cauldron contained a large amount of stew.

entities.name: flagon
entities.description: Fred and George bewitched an iron flagon of butterbeer to hurtle through the air.

entities.name: butterbeer
entities.description: The flagon contained a large amount of butterbeer.

entities.name: breadboard
entities.description: Fred and George bewitched a heavy wooden breadboard to hurtle through the air.

entities.name: knife
entities.description: The breadboard was complete with a knife.

entities.name: Mrs. Weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley shouted at Harry, Sirius, and Mundungus to carry the objects away.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry was present in the scene.

entities.name: Sirius
entities.description: Sirius was present in the scene and examined the goblet with distaste.

entities.name: Mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus was present in the scene and polished the goblet with his cuff.

relationships.description: Fred bewitched a cauldron of stew to hurtle through the air.
George bewitched an iron flagon of butterbeer to hurtle through the air.
Fred and George bewitched a heavy wooden breadboard, complete with knife, to hurtle through the air.
